entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who cannot be helped at the moment. ("He had a moment’s indecision, but there was nothing they could do for Ron at the moment")

entities.name: black
entities.description: Black is in trouble and possibly injured. ("by the sound of it, Black was in trouble —")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry sets off at a run to help Ron and Black. ("Harry set oﬀ at a run, Hermione right behind him.")

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is running behind Harry to help them. ("Hermione right behind him")

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius has turned back into a man and is crouched on all fours, his hands over his head. ("They saw why — Sirius had turned back into a man.")

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are mentioned as a group of creatures that are encircling Harry and Hermione. ("at least a hundred of them, gliding in a black mass around the lake toward them.")

relationships.description: Harry is helping Ron by running to his aid. ("He had a moment’s indecision, but there was nothing they could do for Ron at the moment")
Black is in trouble and possibly injured by something. ("by the sound of it, Black was in trouble —")
Harry is helping Hermione by running to her aid. ("Hermione right behind him")
Sirius has been attacked by Dementors and turned back into a man. ("The yelping stopped abruptly. As they reached the lakeshore, they saw why — Sirius had turned back into a man.")
Dementors are encircling Harry and Hermione. ("at least a hundred of them, gliding in a black mass around the lake toward them.")
Dementors are encircling Harry and Hermione. ("at least a hundred of them, gliding in a black mass around the lake toward them.")
